entities.label: Case 0192/04 - Fraud Allegations at Pristina Airport

edges.label: 1. Alleged Fraudulent Activities
edges.tooltip: The Cargo Department at Pristina Airport was involved in unauthorized payments for handling and storage of goods.

edges.label: 2. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: UNMIK Investigation Task Force conducted the investigation on fraud allegations.

edges.label: 3. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: The investigation focused on fraudulent activities at Pristina Airport.

edges.label: 4. Fraudulent Collection
edges.tooltip: Official 1 illegally collected €8,000, unrecorded in official accounts.

edges.label: 5. Unexplained Omissions
edges.tooltip: Official 2 failed to document €32,000 in storage fees.

edges.label: 6. Violation Found
edges.tooltip: The investigation concluded that the activities violated KCC Article 215 - Fraud in Service.

edges.label: 7. Violation Found
edges.tooltip: The investigation concluded that the activities violated KCC Article 219 - Embezzlement.

edges.label: 8. Business Interaction
edges.tooltip: The company led by four partners was involved in transactions with Pristina Airport.

edges.label: 9. Regulatory Oversight
edges.tooltip: Customs Service was involved in the oversight of importation processes at Pristina Airport.

Pristina Airport: Involvement in unauthorized payments for handling and storage of goods.
Cargo Department: Fraudulent financial practices and illegal payment solicitation.
Official 1: Illegally collected €8,000 unrecorded in official accounts.
Official 2: Failed to document €32,000 in storage fees.
